Articles.Content:
Just saw DasValdez launch his first craft in a 1.0 career in hard mode, to a few km height. 

**He had** **100,000 funds** **before his second launch, in hard mode!**

ROFL ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Is Das playing at half res textures? Or is that the full resolution of 1.0?

> 
> Decouplers are tweakable stock now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Clamshells are not a thing ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> I found both of these from WinterOwl's video. The stream was killing my hype ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I had the same problem with the stream. Thanks for pointing out Winter Owl. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Is Das playing at half res textures? Or is that the full resolution of 1.0?

Check your stream settings. I set it to source and he's doing full res.

"Chase" camera is now called "Locked" and is just a camera mode ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) :) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This vid best shows the dust effects.

Edit: wrong video.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T19:46:41Z" title="04/25/2015 07:46  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Robotengineer**

Just saw Elysium's video,

HYYYYYYYYYYPEEEEEEEEE

Watching Twitch now. Engine Precoolers are a thing.

Rune. :Faints:

> 
> Watching Twitch now. Engine Precoolers are a thing.
> Rune. :Faints:

What do the pre-coolers do? Are they like Skylons? Maybe they allow more air to be used at higher altitudes and speeds? I heard that air-hogging my not be a thing anymore so that would explain their appearance.

> 
> Watching Twitch now. Engine Precoolers are a thing.
> Rune. :Faints:

Missed that bit.. What? how?

> 
> Just saw DasValdez launch his first craft in a 1.0 career in hard mode, to a few km height. 
> **He had** **100,000 funds** **before his second launch, in hard mode!**
> 
> ROFL ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Well, TBH Das needed 131k to hire **one** astronaut. Without a better look, we can't say if the money is scarce or too much

> 
> Just saw Elysium's video,
> HYYYYYYYYYYPEEEEEEEEE

Agreed

!

> 
> Missed that bit.. What? how?

Yup, aero goodnes on right now and the precoolers apparently stop engines overheating and throttling down. Hurry and watch it!

Edit: switching to pawn now. Wow that was a rush. I'm grinning like a madman here. There may be things I will complain about (how could there not be?) but boy oh boy. This is promising.

Rune. Delta-v to orbit is considerably lower, that's for sure.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T20:03:17Z" title="04/25/2015 08:03  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by Rune**
I wish there were 2 more sizes of airbrakes, medium and small. Or being able to change the deflection angle.
Oh god, planes and chase cam look so fun ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)
The crowd has calmed down a little, but the 60 second slow mode is still there and being annoying ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Fairings don't look amazing, but I really don't care. THERE IS SOO MucH GOOD STUFF.

Also, nothing like some kessler syndrome in Kerbal Space Program.

HYPE!

> 
> Fairings don't look amazing, but I really don't care. THERE IS SOO MucH GOOD STUFF.
> Also, nothing like some kessler syndrome in Kerbal Space Program.
> 
> HYPE!

The fairing debris are non-persistent, just like the engine fairings.

> 
> The fairing debris are non-persistent, just like the engine fairings.

Thats good

HYPE!

Listening to hardcore dubstep while my brain and body prepare for carpel tunnel and delta-v calculations.

let's do this
The hype is FRIGGIN' REAL! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) My god!

Engage more hype

"Captain, we cannae have this much hype! The ship'll fall apart!"

"I don't care Scotty! Engage the HypeBurners!"
Speaking of hypeburners, have we gone plaid yet?

> 
> Speaking of hypeburners, have we gone plaid yet?

Screw plaid, we're going \*way\* beyond that by now.

Yes.

![cqrLZw6.gif](http://i.imgur.com/cqrLZw6.gif)
